What's your intention for today?
Randomize Image
Use image from url

We are powerful beings.

But only when we focus our attention is when we can truly leverage that power. One good way to help us focus our attention is to set intentions. Intentions are different than goals. Goals require a specific outcome. Intentions are succeded on the present, second after second.
